CommandDefinition.Name: listactiveorders
CommandDefinition.Description: List all active orders, which are linked to a workspace or an application.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version of the application.

BoolOption.Name: vo
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows also orderIds

BoolOption.Name: vt
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows also cronIds and batchProcessIds

BoolOption.Name: vf
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows also frequencyControlledTaskIds

BoolOption.Name: g
BoolOption.Description: List active orders belonging to the other cluster node as well.
